subject: Simsonn Plus X pedals
description_text:
Hello,

I just bought the Plus X pedals and downloaded the software (2.1.2) for it.
But, for some reason, it can't be detected by Assetto Corsa Evo. Is there a
way to fix it?

Thank you,
Nhan Nguyen

conversations.body_text: Hi jerry nguyen,  Have you calibrated the pedals? ACC EVO is supported.

Yes, I did. The game can't be found on in the "games" page of the software.
When I launch the game, the pedals don't work at all

On Mon, Dec 8, 2025, 3:17 AM support@simsonn.com

Hi jerry nguyen,  Our engineers have tested the pedals, and they are compatible with this game. However, SIMSONN Manager currently does not include a quick launch feature, so you can start the game through Steam.

Hello,

I do see the screen you screenshoted on my end. But I can't seem to bind
the pedals to the throttle and brake. When I click on each respective
function to bind and press on the respective pedal, it won't register. I
have the Simsonn software on the 2nd monitor to see if I'm pressing it; the
software shows that it does, but for some reason, in the game, it refuses
to register. Can you help?

Thank you

On Thu, Dec 11, 2025 at 12:04 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi jerry nguyen,  You can install ToDesk—no registration required. I will provide the ID and verification code so I can assist you remotely to resolve the issue.

Hello,

I'm cool with that. I'm available from 7pm - 12am from monday to wednesday
next week and all day thursday to sunday. Please let me know which time
works best for you.

Thank you

On Sat, Dec 20, 2025 at 4:36 AM support@simsonn.com
Hi jerry nguyen,  Do you have time for remote assistance this weekend?
Hi jerry nguyen,  I can assist you remotely today.
